src:
Two cargo ships sank in East Asia waters
04 Nov 2019, 06:26 by Mikhail Voytenko
Cargo ship sank on Nov 3 in Yellow sea China, being caught in rough seas. All crew were rescued.Cargo ship sank reportedly, early in the morning Nov 3 in southern Gulf of Tonkin. All crew were rescued.

Two cargo ships sank in East Asia waters
04 Nov 2019, 06:26 by Mikhail Voytenko
Cargo ship sank on Nov 3 in Yellow sea China, being caught in rough seas. All crew were rescued.Cargo ship sank reportedly, early in the morning Nov 3 in southern Gulf of Tonkin. All crew were rescued.
